page.title: 12Stubble Burning.
page.content: Many people think stubble burning is dangerous. Even when farmers obey all the safety rules accidents may still happen.Last year a farmer left his tractor in one of his fields and went to have his tea.The tractor engine was hot and set fire to the stubble.It took 8 fire engines to put out the fire. There are strict rules farmers have to obey. Before they burn the stubble they must plough and clear the straw from a strip all round the edge of the fields so that hedges and trees are not damaged by the flames.They must chop up the straw so that it is low on the ground. They may not burn the fields if the wind is strong, or at weekends. Village people dislike stubble burning because smuts and soot dirty people's houses and clothes. Hedges are singed by the flames and wildlife is destroyed.
